item.title: 7.3 magnitude earthquake rattles Alaskan island, prompting tsunami warning
item.description: A 7.3 magnitude earthquake struck near Sand Point, Alaska, on Wednesday, prompting a tsunami warning from the National Weather Service.

item.title: Trump blasts 'stupid,' 'foolish' Republicans amid calls to reveal more Epstein files
item.description: President Donald Trump continued Wednesday to dismiss calls within his own party for more transparency into the Jeffrey Epstein investigation.

item.title: Fire at assisted-living facility 'was destined to kill 50-plus people': Chief
item.description: The fire that claimed nine lives at an assisted-living facility in Fall River, Massachusetts, "was destined to kill 50-plus people," according to the ...

item.title: WATCH: Hikers confront man accused of starting fire on Los Angeles trail
item.description: A group of hikers stepped in to help stop an alleged arsonist accused of starting a fire in LA's popular Runyon Canyon.

item.title: WATCH: New Jersey delivery driver almost struck by lightning
item.description: A frightening moment was captured on camera as a delivery driver in Wayne, New Jersey, was almost struck by lightning on Monday as thunderstorms moved...
